steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (a52f5f3b0a6ce8a4620104959637465a)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*[@class="Polaris-Frame-Toast"]//*[text()="Page published"] with timeout 30 second
Verify text Enable autosave? of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name:
==> The Text is: Enable autosave?
Enabling autosave allows you to automatically save any changes made to the current page. Learn more
Autosaving will not create new versions in version history. To create one, you need to manually save your progress in the editor.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Enable

==> The Text is: Enable autosave?
Enabling autosave allows you to automatically save any changes made to the current page. Learn more
Autosaving will not create new versions in version history. To create one, you need to manually save your progress in the editor.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Enable
Verify text of an element [Contains] : true

Verify page saved and published successfully

Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/span[@class="Polaris-Badge Polaris-Badge--toneSuccess"]//*[text()="Published"] with timeout 30 second
